Romero’s first entry into that particular camp called ‘Night Of The Living Dead’ spawned nine additional movies, as well as several popular theatrical sequels by other filmmakers. With popularity apparent, studios wanted in on this zombie gold rush.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie was pale by comparison to more recent Disney fairy tales movies.
My favorite part of Snow White was not music or animation,, it was that i got to pick any character costume

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless action film. In Canada stopping for fuel, Joe goes to the Palace Petula beauty pageant final. There, he meets Miss Anchorage and love ensues.
